snippet: Eight weight lifters, including two gold medalists, were provisionally suspended after failing doping tests at last month’s world championships.
abstract: Eight weight lifters are provisionally suspended after failing doping tests at world championships in Kazakhstan; group includes gold medalists Kim Un ju and Daniel Godelli.
lead_paragraph: Eight weight lifters, including two gold medalists, were provisionally suspended after failing doping tests at last month’s world championships.

headline.main: Eight Weight Lifters Fail Doping Tests
